remarks: The ` CNF ` function is a function from finitely supported functions from ` B ` to ` A ` , to the ordinal exponential ` A ^o B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2015.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnff $p |- ( ph -> ( A CNF B ) : S --> ( A ^o B ) ) $.
